name: Marzal Concept
description:
A low-poly version of the 1967 Lamborghini Marzal concept car created with Crocotile.

All the images and gifs (except for the spin-arounds done in Crocotile) are captured in-engine from a prototype I'm plugging away on in Unity. Zip file includes Crocotile file and textures. Note: the glass texture will appear opaque white in Crocotile— a custom material was applied in unity to get a glass effect.
